headline: Federal Realty Highlights $400 Million Resi-Over-Retail Pipeline
summary: Federal Realty Investment Trust (NYSE:FRT) today highlighted its growing Resi-Over-Retail development platform, a proven strategy designed to create long-term value by layering residential density onto its existing retail properties. The company currently has approximately $400 million of residential development projects underway across multiple markets, with the Willow Grove redevelopment representing the latest project within this expanding pipeline.

content.title: Federal Realty Highlights $400 Million Resi-Over-Retail Pipeline
content.summary: Federal Realty Investment Trust (NYSE:FRT) today highlighted its growing Resi-Over-Retail development platform, a proven strategy designed to create long-term value by layering residential density onto its existing retail properties. The company currently has approximately $400 million of residential development projects underway across multiple markets, with the Willow Grove redevelopment representing the latest project within this expanding pipeline.

thumbnail.caption: Federal Realty is a recognized leader in the ownership, operation and redevelopment of high-quality retail based properties located primarily in major coastal markets from Washington, D.C. to Boston as well as San Francisco and Los Angeles. (PRNewsfoto/Federal Realty Investment Trust)
